attributes.action: Provide more dog wardens in North Devon
attributes.background: Provide dog wardens, or create a job for civilian enforcement officers to issue fines on the spot for anyone caught allowing their dog to foul without picking up, not carrying poo bags or bagging but then leaving it.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
